homeScreenTemplate:
<script>
  try {

    MyCampusApp.rootScope.mobileAppName = "Singapore Institue of Technology";
    MyCampusApp.rootScope.statusBarColor = "#000000";
	StatusBar.backgroundColorByHexString(MyCampusApp.rootScope.statusBarColor);
    function exitApp() {
      navigator.app.exitApp();
    }

    function successAuth(data) {
      if (!data) {
        $.unblockUI();
        if (window.device) {
          navigator.notification.alert(
            'Some error occurred. Please try again', // message
            null, // callback
            'Error', // title
            'OK' // buttonName
          );
        } else {
          alert('Some error occurred. Please try again')
        }
        navigator.app.exitApp();
        return;
      }

      MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['accessToken'] = data.access_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['refreshToken'] = data.refresh_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['providerData'] = data.access_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.erpticket = {};
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.erpticket[$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').erp.name] = data.access_token;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = true;

      /* User info for logging into ERP/LMS */
      var subVal = $.jStorage.get("userSub")
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.username = "";
      if (subVal) {
        var userSplit = subVal.split('/');
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.username = (userSplit.length == 1) ? userSplit[0].split('@')[0] : userSplit[1].split('@')[0];
        console.log("user sub= " + MyCampusApp.rootScope.username);
      }
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.password = $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword");

      MyCampusApp.rootScope.isUserTenantAdmin = MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.admins.indexOf(MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['email']) !== -1;

      /*if ($.jStorage.get('setSecurityQuestion') === true){
          window.location.href = '#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279Page2';
      }else {
          window.location.href = '#/app/Settings2/Settings2Page9';
      }*/

      //Checking Notification Counter

      if (MyCampusApp.rootScope.badgeCall === undefined) {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.badgeCall = true;
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.getNotificationBadgeMobile();
        var badgeInterval = 1 * 60 * 1000; //every one minute
        setInterval(MyCampusApp.rootScope.getNotificationBadgeMobile, badgeInterval);
      }

      window.location.href = '#/app/Settings2/Settings2Page9';
    }

    function failureAuth(err) {
      $.unblockUI();
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = false;
      if ($.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp) {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.user = null;

        window.location.href = '#/app/Menu82/Menu82'; /* Redirect user to home page */
      } else {
        window.location.href = '#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279'; /* Redirect user to signin page since it doesn't have guest applets */
      }

      if (window.device) {
        navigator.notification.alert("Unable to login, please check your credentials", null, '', 'Ok');
      } else {
        alert("Unable to login, please check your credentials");
      }
    }

    var redirectUser = function() {
      /* Check if the user is logged in */
      if ($.jStorage.get("unifyedusername") && $.jStorage.get("unifyedpassword")) {
        console.log($.jStorage.get('user'));
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.user = $.jStorage.get('user');
        console.log('UserObject', MyCampusApp.rootScope.user);
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.GatewayUrl = 'https://' + MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['domain'] + MyCampusApp.rootScope.user['gatewaypath'];
        successAuth({
          access_token: MyCampusApp.rootScope.user.accessToken
        });
        //window.location.href = '#/app/Settings2/Settings2Page9';

      } else {
        MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn = false;
        /* Check if app has only guest applets */
        if ($.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp) {
          MyCampusApp.rootScope.user = null;

          window.location.href = '#/app/Menu82/Menu82'; /* Redirect user to home page */
        } else {
          window.location.href = '#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279'; /* Redirect user to signin page since it doesn't have guest applets */
        }
      }
    }

    /* Check if the app is running as standalone app */
    if (true) {
      /* Get insititution details from tenant Id */
      /*var settings = {
          "async": true,
          "crossDomain": true,
          "method": "GET",
          "headers": {
              "content-type": "application/json",
              "x-tenant-id": "mobileportal123"
          }
      };

        

      switch (MyCampusApp.rootScope.environment) {
          case 'dev':
              {
                  settings['url'] = 'https://seark.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
                  break;
              }
          case 'stage':
              {
                  settings['url'] = 'https://nmsu-staging.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway-preprod/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=mobileportal123';
                  break;
              }
          case 'prod':
              {
                  settings['url'] = 'https://api.unifyed.com/unifyd-gateway/api/unifydplatform/open/school?school=' + MyCampusApp.config.tenant;
                  break;
              }
      }*/

      MyCampusApp.rootScope.environment = "demo";
      $.jStorage.set('tenantInfo', {
        "id": "5b4e143f2985750001660ac5",
        "name": "Singapore Institute",
        "logoUrl": "https://kryptosda.kryptosmobile.com/kryptosds/imagegallery/dfccad19-f814-4f7a-9b49-27d2cba487c5.png",
        "tenantId": "SITU8",
        "appId": "9392",
        "guestApp": true,
        "erp": {
          "name": "banner",
          "sso": true,
          "useSessionUser": false
        },
        "lms": null
      });
      //window.location.href = '#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279';
      redirectUser();
      /*try {
          $.blockUI();
          $.ajax(settings).done(function(response) {
              $.unblockUI();
              $.jStorage.set('tenantInfo', response.content[0]);
              redirectUser();
          }).fail(function(err) {
              $.unblockUI();
              alert(JSON.stringify(err));
          });
      } catch (e) {
          $.unblockUI();
          if (window.device) {
              navigator.notification.alert('Something went wrong, please try after sometime.', exitApp, '', 'Ok');
          } else {
              alert('Something went wrong, please try after sometime.');
          }
      }*/
    } else {
      redirectUser();
    }

    var handleSwitch = function(btn) {
      if (btn == 1) {
        window.location.href = '#/amakerhome';
      }
    }
    var switchApp = function() {
      if (window.device) {
        navigator.notification.confirm("Do you want to switch app?", handleSwitch, 'Switch App', ['Yes', 'No']);
      }
    }

    var onBackKeyDown = function(event) {
      console.log(window.location);
      var loc = window.location;
      MyCampusApp.rootScope.leftToRight = true;
      if (loc.hash == "#/app/Menu82/Menu82" && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn && MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        exitApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/Menu82/Menu82" && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        switchApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/Menu82/Menu82" && MyCampusApp.rootScope.loggedIn) {
        window.location.href = "#/app/TodaysSchedule2/TodaysSchedule2";
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/WhatsUp/WhatsUp") {
        exitApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && $.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp) {
        window.location.href = "#/app/Menu82/Menu82";
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && !$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp) {
        exitApp();
      } else if (loc.hash == "#/app/SignIn279/SignIn279" && !$.jStorage.get('tenantInfo').guestApp && !MyCampusApp.rootScope.standaloneApp) {
        switchApp();
      } else {
        window.history.back();
      }
    }
    document.addEventListener("backbutton", onBackKeyDown, true);

    var Notification = PushNotification.init({
      android: {
        senderID: "1012473507211"
      },
      browser: {
        pushServiceURL: 'http://push.api.phonegap.com/v1/push'
      },
      ios: {
        alert: "true",
        badge: "true",
        sound: "true"
      },
      windows: {}
    });

    Notification.on('registration', function(data) {
      var devicePushID = data.registrationId;
    });

    MyCampusApp.rootScope.inAppNotificationHandler(Notification);

    $('input:text').focusout(function() {
      $("#footerContentContainer").addClass('footerGroupIcons').removeClass('hideFooter');
      $("#bottomPoweredBy").removeClass('hideFooter');

    });

    $('input:text').focusin(function() {

      $("#footerContentContainer").addClass('hideFooter').removeClass('footerGroupIcons');
      $("#bottomPoweredBy").addClass('hideFooter');
    });

    StatusBar.backgroundColorByHexString("#252729");
    StatusBar.overlaysWebView(false);
    window.screen.orientation.lock('portrait');
  } catch (e) {
    //alert(e);
  }
</script>

<style>
  .message_main .selectedChannel {
    padding-left: 0;
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }
  
  .modal-content label {
    color: #505050!important;
  }
  
  .owl-carousel {
    position: inherit;
  }
  
  .message_main .selectedChannel .userPreferances {
    text-transform: capitalize;
    border-radius: 4px;
    padding: 6px 12px;
  }
  
  .message_main .messageStatus {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-right: 15px;
    padding-right: 15px;
    vertical-align: middle;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .message_main .messageStatus:after {
    content: '';
    border-right: 1px solid #e7e7e7;
    position: absolute;
    right: 0;
    height: 15px;
    width: 1px;
    top: 0;
    bottom: 0;
    margin: auto;
    /* transform: translateY(-50%); */
  }
  
  .message_main .messageStatus::last-of-type {
    border-right: 0 !important;
    margin-right: 15px;
    padding-right: 15px;
  }
  
  .message_main .messageStatus img {
    margin-right: 5px;
    margin-top: -4px;
  }
  
  .message_main .appletScrollerArea {
    padding-top: 0 !important;
  }
  
  .message_main .padding8px15px {
    padding: 8px 15px;
  }
  
  .message_main .dropChannel {
    padding: 3px 14px;
    font-weight: bold;
    display: inline-block;
  }
  /******************************/
  /***** Checkbox CSS *****/
  
  .message_main .control {
    display: block;
    position: relative;
    padding-left: 30px;
    cursor: pointer;
    font-size: 14px;
  }
  
  .message_main .control input {
    position: absolute;
    z-index: -1;
    opacity: 0;
  }
  
  .message_main .fullWidth {
    width: 100% !important;
  }
  /* Checkbox css end */
  
  .message_main #myProgress {
    width: 68%;
    background-color: #ddd;
    position: absolute;
    top: 39%;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    margin: 0 auto;
  }
  
  .message_main #myBar {
    width: 0%;
    height: 1px;
    background-color: #2bb85d;
    background: #2bb85d;
  }
  
  .message_main #dropdownMenuLink,
  .message_main #dropdownAddTags,
  .message_main #dropdownGroupLink {
    width: 100%;
    padding: 11px 12px 9px 12px;
    display: block;
    text-align: left;
    margin-top: 0px;
  }
  
  .message_main .progress_bar {
    margin-top: 22%;
    width: 100%;
    height: 2px;
    background-color: #D8D8D8;
    display: inline-block;
    z-index: 1;
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .message_main .badge {
    display: inline-block;
    width: 14px;
    height: 14px;
    vertical-align: middle;
    background-color: #fff;
    border: #c2c2c2 solid 1px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    padding: 2px;
    line-height: 0;
    margin-top: 8px;
  }
  
  .message_main .badge>.solidCircle {
    background: #fff;
    border-radius: 50%;
    height: 8px;
    width: 8px;
    display: inline-block;
  }
  
  .message_main .badge.activeTag>.solidCircle {
    background: #252729;
    border-radius: 50%;
    height: 8px;
    width: 8px;
    display: inline-block;
  }
  
  .message_main .badge.completeTag>.solidCircle {
    display: none;
  }
  
  .message_main .activeTag {
    border: #252729 solid 1px;
  }
  
  .message_main .completeTag {
    background: #252729;
    background-color: #252729;
    border: #252729 solid 1px;
  }
  
  .message_main .completeTitle {
    color: #2bb85d !important;
  }
  
  .message_main .inputContainer {
    padding-bottom: 14px;
  }
  
  .message_main .inputContainer>.dropdown {
    border: #c2c2c2 solid 1px;
    padding: 0;
    height: 40px;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .message_main .overflowHidden {
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .message_main .inputContainer input[type=text],
  .message_main .inputContainer textarea {
    padding: 8px 12px;
    border: #c2c2c2 solid 1px;
    width: 100%;
    height: 39px;
    transition: ease-in-out 0.15s;
  }
  
  .message_main input[type=text]:focus,
  .message_main textarea:focus,
  .message_main .dropdown:focus {
    border: #767676 solid 1px;
  }
  
  .message_main .inputContainer textarea {
    height: 120px;
  }
  
  .message_main .mediaImageContainer {
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .message_main .mediaImageContainer .youtubeIcon {
    max-width: 24px;
    height: auto;
  }
  
  .message_main .mediaImageContainer .overflowHidden {
    max-height: 100px;
    max-width: 100px;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: #eaebec;
  }
  
  .message_main .mediaImageContainer .mediaImage {
    width: 100%;
    min-height: 60px;
    max-height: 100%;
    min-width: 80px;
    vertical-align: middle;
    margin: 50% 0 0 50%;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
  }
  
  .message_main .mediaImageContainer .mediaDelete {
    background: #767676;
    position: absolute;
    width: 22px;
    height: 22px;
    right: -11px;
    top: -7px;
    border-radius: 50%;
    border: #fff solid 2px;
    display: inline-block;
    z-index: 2;
  }
  
  .message_main .mediaImageContainer .mediaDelete img {
    margin-left: 5px;
    margin-top: -1px;
  }
  
  .message_main .mediaName {
    max-width: 75%;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .message_main .deliverChannelContainer .deliverChannel {
    width: 16%;
    margin-right: 0.5%;
    text-align: center !important;
    display: inline-block;
    position: relative;
    padding-left: 0px !important;
    vertical-align: top;
  }
  
  .message_main .deliverChannelContainer .deliverChannel:last-of-type {
    margin-right: 0%;
  }
  
  .message_main .deliverChannelContainer .deliverChannel label {
    border-radius: 4px;
    border: #767676 solid 1px;
    display: block;
    padding: 7px 3px;
  }
  
  .message_main .deliverChannelContainer .deliverChannel label:hover {
    opacity: 1;
    cursor: pointer;
  }
  
  .message_main .deliverChannelContainer .deliverChannel label .control__indicator {
    left: auto;
    right: 4px;
    top: 4px;
  }
  
  .message_main .deliverChannelContainer .deliverChannel label img {
    max-width: 50%;
    margin: 8px auto;
    display: block;
  }
  
  .message_main .deliverChannelContainer .deliverChannel label .channelNameContainer {
    height: 25px;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .message_main .deliverChannelContainer .deliverChannel label .channelNameContainer .channelName {
    color: #525252 !important;
    line-height: 12px;
    font-size: 11px;
    text-align: center;
    width: 100%;
  }
  
  .message_main .deliverChannelContainer .deliverChannel label .channelNameContainer .channelName span {
    font-size: 9px;
  }
  
  .message_main .scheduleLater .dateTime {
    display: block;
  }
  
  .message_main .input-group.date.settings #datetimepicker11 {
    height: 16px;
  }
  
  .message_main .input-group.date.settings div {
    bottom: 0%;
  }
  
  .message_main .publish .modal-content .carousel-inner {
    min-height: 450px;

<div class="message_main">
  <div class="list-group-item toolbar-menu clearfix" ng-show="automatedAlerts">
    <div id="tab1" tabindex="0" aria-label="Manual Tab" class="col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 toolbar-column toolbar-column-active borderNone focusTranspatent" ng-click="selectTab('tab1')">
      <span class="proximaFont">Manual</span>
    </div>
    <div id="tab2" tabindex="0" aria-label="Automated Tab" class="focusTranspatent col-xs-6 col-sm-6 col-lg-6 col-md-4 toolbar-column " ng-click="selectTab('tab2')">
      <span class="proximaFont">Automated</span>
    </div>
  </div>
  <div ng-show="selTab == 1">
    <div class="proximaFont sm_webAppletContentPadding bottomPaddingMobile ng-scope">
      <div ng-show="messagingList.length!==0 || searchCase" class="">
        <div class="borderRadiusTopWeb  marginBottom15px">
          <div class="colPadding" ng-class="studioParam == undefined?'col-lg-3 col-md-3 col-sm-4 col-xs-6':studioParam == 4?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 8?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 6?'col-xs-6':'col-lg-3'">
            <div class="focusTranspatent dropdown dropdownMenuSelect" tabindex="0" aria-label="All message dropdown">
              <button class="btn btn-default dropdown-toggle greytext  backgroundTransparent" type="button" id="dropdownMenuButton" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-haspopup="true" aria-expanded="false">
                <span>{{dropDownMessage}}</span>
                <span class="fa fa-angle-down pull-right"></span>
              </button>
              <ul class="dropdown-menu multiCheckPadding" aria-labelledby="dropdownMenuButton">
                <span class="dropChannel">Channel</span></li>
                <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone ng-scope clearfix" ng-repeat="channel in channels" ng-if="channel.enable == true">
                  <a class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">
                    <div class="control-group">
                      <label class="control control--checkbox fontSize12" ng-click="isChannelSelected(channel,$event)">
                        {{channel.channel}}
                        <input type="checkbox" ng-checked="selChannels.indexOf(channel.channelId) != -1" />
                        <div class="control__indicator"></div>
                      </label>
                    </div>
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone paddingTB10 clearfix"><span class="dropChannel">Status</span></li>
                <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone clearfix">
                  <a class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">
                    <div class="control-group">
                      <label class="control control--checkbox fontSize12" ng-click="isStatusSelected('Sent',$event)">
                        Sent
                        <input type="checkbox" ng-checked="selStatus.indexOf('Sent') != -1" />
                        <div class="control__indicator"></div>
                      </label>
                    </div>
                  </a>
                </li>
                <li clas="list-group-item colPadding borderNone clearfix">
                  <a class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">
                    <div class="control-group">
                      <label class="control control--checkbox fontSize12" ng-click="isStatusSelected('Scheduled',$event)">
                        Scheduled
                        <input type="checkbox" ng-checked="selStatus.indexOf('Scheduled') != -1" />
                        <div class="control__indicator"></div>
                      </label>
                    </div>
                  </a>
                </li>
              </ul>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="verticalAlignMiddle colPadding text-right pull-right" ng-if="$root.webApp" ng-class="studioParam == undefined?'col-sm-6 col-xs-6 ':studioParam == 4?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 8?'col-xs-6':studioParam == 6?'col-xs-6':'col-lg-6'">
            <button class="btn btn-small btn-primary" ng-if="createPermission" ng-click="gotonext()" aria-label="Create Message">+ Create</button>
          </div>
          <div class="verticalAlignMiddle colPadding text-right pull-right col-sm-6 col-xs-6" ng-if="!$root.webApp">
            <button class="btn btn-small btn-primary focusTranspatent" ng-click="gotonext()" aria-label="Create Message">+ Create <span class="hide480px"> Message </span></button>
          </div>
          <div class="clearfix"></div>
        </div>
        <div style="clear:both;"></div>
        <div ng-show="selTab == 1" class="ng-show">
          <div class="focusTranspatent list-group-item borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom15px word-wrap ng-scope" ng-repeat="m in messagingList" tabindex="0" aria-label="message box">
            <div class="font16 font-weight600 marginBottom15px">
              <div class="fontSize16 lineheight22 messagingList" ng-bind-html=trusthtml(m.shortMessage)></div>
            </div>
            <div class="font12 colorDarkGrey marginBottom15px">
              <div class="messageStatus" style="vertical-align: middle;" aria-label="Message Status {{m.messageTitle}}">
                <span ng-if="m.messageStatus == 'Sent'"><img src="images/sendSuccess.png" alt="success icon" class="iconWidth16px">{{m.messageTitle}}</span>
                <span ng-if="m.messageStatus != 'Sent'"><img src="images/time.png" alt="time icon" class="iconWidth16px"> {{m.messageTitle}}</span>
              </div>
              <div class="messageStatus"  aria-label="Message Created by{{m.createdBy}}">By - {{m.createdBy}}</div>
              <a href class="messageStatus" ng-class="!deletePermission ? 'disable':''" ng-click="deleteMessage(m,$event,$index);" aria-label="trash icon"><i class="fa fa-trash-o fontSize18 themeAccentColor cursorPointer"></i></a>
              <a href class="messageStatus" ng-class="!updatePermission ? 'disable':''" ng-if="m.messageStatus != 'Sent'" ng-click="editScheduleMess(m,$event,index);" aria-label="edit icon"><i class="fa fa-pencil fontSize18 themeAccentColor cursorPointer"></i></a>
            </div>
            <div class="font14 colorLigherGrey">
              <ul class="selectedChannel">

          <a href class="backButton cursorPointer" ng-click="gotoDbConfigHome()" ng-if="$root.webApp" tabindex="0" aria-label="back button">
            <span class="fa fa-angle-left"></span>  Back
          </a>
        </div>
        <div class="font18 fontBold paddingBottom15px">Database Configuration</div>
        <form ng-submit="dbConfigSave()">
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label class="control-label">ERP*</label>
              <div class="dropdown dropdownMenuSelect">
                <div class="btn btn-default border1px dropdown-toggle dropdownMenuLink" type="button" data-toggle="dropdown">
                  <span>{{smDbConfig.erp}}</span>
                  <span class="fa fa-angle-down pull-right"></span>
                </div>
                <ul class="dropdown-menu fixedDropdown" aria-label="dropdownMenu">
                  <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone">
                    <a ng-click="erpselect()">
                      <div class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">Banner</div>
                    </a>
                  </li>
                </ul>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>

            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">

              <label for="driverClassname" class="control-label">Driver classname*</label>

            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="url" class="control-label">Url*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" placeholder="Paste url" aria-label="add URL" name="url" id="url" ng-model="smDbConfig.url" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="username" class="control-label">Username*</label>
              <input type="text" class="form-control input-sm" aria-label="Username" placeholder="Username" name="username" id="username" ng-model="smDbConfig.username" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="password" class="control-label">Password*</label>
              <input type="password" class="form-control input-sm" aria-label="Password" placeholder="Password" name="password" id="password" ng-model="smDbConfig.password" required/>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px text-center">

          </div>
        </form>

            <span class="fa fa-angle-left"></span>  Back
          </div>
        </div>
        <div class="font18 fontBold paddingBottom15px">App Configuration</div>

              <div class="dropdown dropdownMenuSelect">
                <div class="btn btn-default border1px dropdown-toggle dropdownMenuLink" type="button" data-toggle="dropdown">
                  <span>{{smAppConfig.alertType}}</span>
                  <span class="fa fa-angle-down pull-right"></span>
                </div>
                <ul class="dropdown-menu fixedDropdown" aria-label="dropdownMenu">
                  <li class="list-group-item colPadding borderNone">
                    <a ng-click="alerttypeselect()">
                      <div class="customPadding cursorPointer dropItemsColor">Portal</div>
                    </a>
                  </li>
                </ul>
              </div>
            </div>
          </div>
          <div class="colPadding borderRadius4px clearfix marginBottom10px">
            <div class="form-group">
              <label for="userMappingQuery" class="control-label">User Mapping Query*</label>
              <textarea ng-model="smAppConfig.userMappingQuery" name="userMappingQuery" id="userMappingQuery" placeholder="Write Query" class="form-control input-sm" required> </textarea>
            </div>
          </div>
